mission.title: Mission
mission.statement: Witnet Foundation is a non-profit dedicated to stewarding the advancement of the Witnet oracle protocol and ecosystem, as well as the broader Web3 space, with a focus on fostering research and development of technologies that enhance the decentralization of communications and financial infrastructure in search of more freedom for the individual.

aboutWitnet.title: What is Witnet
aboutWitnet.p1: Witnet is a network protocol that enables independently operated computers to collaborate in retrieving and aggregating data securely, and to provide that information to smart contract systems in a tamper resistant way.
aboutWitnet.p2: These type of technologies, commonly known as "oracles", are one of the most important cornerstones when building smart contracts that operate on real world data. Without a reliable oracle, smart contracts can be vulnerable to hacks, corruption and monetary loss.
aboutWitnet.p3: Witnet is a next generation decentralized oracle that leverages state-of-the-art cryptographic and cryptoeconomic techniques to provide  smart contracts with secure data input.
